entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
